---
title: "PASTRAMI"
subtitle: "Patient-specific statistics for microstructure-augmented connectomics"
description: ""
---

The PASTRAMI project is funded by the Agence Nationale de la Recherche (ANR) and
aims at developing a new generation of connectomics tools that will be able to
take into account the microstructure of the brain.

The website of the project is available
[here](https://project.inria.fr/pastrami/).
